member.name: P:Exts.Console.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Exts.Console.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Exts.Console.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:Exts.Console.Exts.WaitForKey(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Wait for a key to be pressed.
member.param: How long to wait for in milliseconds?
Is the character shown in the console?
member.returns: The ConsoleKeyInfo the pressed key, or in a timeout Nothing.

member.name: M:Exts.Console.Exts.WaitForYesNo(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Wait for a Yes or No.
member.param: How long to wait for in milliseconds?
Is the character shown in the console?
member.returns: The ConsoleKeyInfo the pressed key, or in a timeout Nothing.
member.remarks: Y or y is Yes, N or n is No.
